name: monitor-vzla
description: Monorepo con diferentes clientes para monitorear el precio del dolar paralelo en Venezuela

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn core build && yarn workspace $PACKAGE_NAME build
scripts.bot-discord:dev: concurrently "yarn core dev" "yarn workspace bot-discord dev"
scripts.bot-telegram:dev: concurrently "yarn core dev" "yarn workspace bot-telegram dev"
